alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jackson County through 1015 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Litchfield to near Pioneer. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson... Brooklyn... Grass Lake... Vandercook Lake... Leoni... Spring Arbor... Napoleon... Sandstone... Norvell... Pulaski... Concord... Horton... Parma... Hanover... Oak Point... Tompkins... Rives Junction... Sunset Beach... Michigan Center... Munith... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
